bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers
IEEE Standard for Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This IEEE Standards product is part of the C57 family on Power Distribution and Regulating Transformers. This standard sets forth bar code label requirements for overhead, padmounted, and underground-type distribution transformers. Included herein are requirements for data content, symbology, label layout, print quality, and label life expectancy.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.12.35-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.35-1996)
IEEE Std C57.12.35-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.35-1996)
